summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3873 for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from a point 40 feet south of Holgate Street to Irving Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance NO. 47333, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
